module.name: DISA
module.description: DISA Allows you 'Direct Inward System Access'. This gives you the ability to have an option on an IVR that gives you a dial tone, and you're able to dial out from the FreePBX machine as if you were connected to a standard extension. It appears as a Destination.
module.changelog: *13.0.6.7* FREEPBX-18480 DISA: Cannot Change 'Call Recording' Setting *13.0.6.6* FREEPBX-18191 *13.0.6.5* Additional php 5.3 fixes *13.0.6.4* Add a backtrace function for deprecated items *13.0.6.3* FREEPBX-18161, php 5.3 compatability *13.0.6.2* FREEPBX-18161 *13.0.6.1* Use the advanced settings path *13.0.6* FREEPBX-11589 Fix caller id override tool tip *13.0.5* Add slideout menu and BMO Search agent *13.0.4* FREEPBX-10191 Answer when pin is set *13.0.3* Invalid array *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* Visual styling fixes *13.0.1alpha1* FREEPBX-9039 Remove Departments from FreePBX *12.0.2* Typo in depends *12.0.1* Call Recording capabilities. *2.11.0.6* #1953 *2.11.0.5* #7388 - Fix DB Syntax error *2.11.0.4* #7263 *2.11.0.3* Add license file *2.11.0.1* DB Abstraction Changes *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.2* #5574 *2.10.0.1* #5507, misc *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.4* #4394 *2.9.0.3* #4859 *2.9.0.2* #4783 *2.9.0.1* set repo *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
